address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x40`.

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*

bus_voltage.docs:
Use the bus voltage (voltage of the high side contact) value of the sensor in V. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*

current.docs:
Use the current value of the sensor in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*

max_current.docs:
**, float**: The maximum current you are expecting. ESPHome will use this to configure the sensor optimally. Defaults to `3.2A`.

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*

max_voltage.docs:
**, float**: The maximum bus voltage you are expecting. ESPHome will use this to configure the sensor optimally. Defaults to `32V` (the max).

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*

power.docs:
Use the power value of the sensor in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*

shunt_resistance.docs:
**, float**: The value of the shunt resistor on the board for current calculation. Defaults to `0.1 ohm`.

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*

shunt_voltage.docs:
Use the shunt voltage (voltage across the shunt resistor) value of the sensor in V. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [INA219 DC Current Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ina219.html#configuration-variables)*
